review: Love this! We can access our Amazon Prime videos quicker and easier than through the browser on our Google TV. It's even easier to watch our Netflix on the Fire Stick than through the Netflix app. And we can quickly and easily move it to our TV in the bedroom or any other TV with a USB plug. Very happy with it!

review: This might be a great device. But unless you have a tv 2 years old or newer.... it's likely NOT to work. This is something that you would THINK the product description page would mention but nooooooooooooooope. So make sure it will be compatible with your tv before you buy. my tv is only 3 and a half years old, so its not like its ancient or anything....and.. for the record... amazon does not want to publish my true, not mean or nasty but not product flattering, review. Which makes me question all the reviews I see now.....
